title: Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room and Bar", 1935
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Office stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Upper left quadrant: DOWN/BRIDGE GROUP; upper right quadrant: SOFA/TABLE MANTEL; lower right quadrant: SCHEME B FOR BAR/AND GAME ROOM; BAR; lower left quadrant: CHAIR/RADIATOR.
description: Floor plan and furniture plan for game room and bar, Jascha Heifetz apartment, New York City. Descending staircase at upper left corner. Bridge table and four chairs near upper left, in front of stair rail. Window on upper wall to left. Wraparound five-piece sofa in upper right corner. Fireplace on upper right wall, fronted by rectangular table. Curved bar in lower right corner. Six round barstools surround bar, extending into game room. Counterspace or shelves behind bar. Large chair in lower left corner, in front of radiator and window on lower left wall. Double-door to the right of window and radiator. Doorway on lower wall to left. Indication of room partition between bar and gameroom.
